com.camerontec.util.jmx

Class JMXUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.camerontec.util.jmx.JMXUtils

  • public final class JMXUtils
extends Object
    This class contains a collection of JMX-related utilities.
    Author:
    guillaume.jacob@orcsoftware.com

      • disableJMXLogging

        public static void disableJMXLogging()
        Disable the JMX logging unless explicitly configured otherwise.

      • buildObjectNameSafe

        public static ObjectName buildObjectNameSafe(String domain,
                                             String key,
                                             String value)
                                      throws IllegalArgumentException
        Utility routine for creating a new ObjectName with exactly one key property without having to catch a MalformedObjectNameException. Such exceptions are reported as IllegalArgumentExceptions.
        Parameters:
        domain - the domain part of the object name
        key - the key name in the key property of the object name
        value - the corresponding value
        Returns:
        the corresponding ObjectName
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if an error occurs while attempting to create the object name
        See Also:
        ObjectName.ObjectName(String, String, String)

      • buildObjectNameSafe

        public static ObjectName buildObjectNameSafe(String domain,
                                             String key,
                                             String value,
                                             boolean isQuery)
                                      throws IllegalArgumentException
        Utility routine for creating a new ObjectName with exactly one key property without having to catch a MalformedObjectNameException. Such exceptions are reported as IllegalArgumentExceptions.
        Parameters:
        domain - the domain part of the object name
        key - the key name in the key property of the object name
        isQuery - indicates whether the resulting object ame should be a query
        value - the corresponding value
        Returns:
        the corresponding ObjectName
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if an error occurs while attempting to create the object name
        See Also:
        ObjectName.ObjectName(String, String, String)

                                             String key1,
                                             String value1,
                                             String key2,
                                             String value2)
                                      throws IllegalArgumentException
        Utility routine for creating a new ObjectName with exactly two key properties without having to catch a MalformedObjectNameException. Such exceptions are reported as IllegalArgumentExceptions.
        Parameters:
        domain - the domain part of the object name
        key1 - the key name in the first key property of the object name
        value1 - the value corresponding to key1
        key2 - the key name in the second key property of the object name
        value2 - the value corresponding to key2
        Returns:
        the corresponding ObjectName
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if an error occurs while attempting to create the object name
        See Also:
        ObjectName.ObjectName(String, String, String)

      • buildObjectNameSafe

        public static ObjectName buildObjectNameSafe(String domain,
                                             Map<String,String> properties,
                                             boolean isQuery,
                                             boolean quoteProperties)
                                      throws IllegalArgumentException
        Utility routine for creating a new ObjectName from a domain and a map of properties without having to catch a MalformedObjectNameException. Such exceptions are reported as IllegalArgumentExceptions.
        Parameters:
        domain - the object name's domain
        properties - a Map containing the object name's properties
        isQuery - indicates whether the resulting object name should be a query
        quoteProperties - Indicates whether values should be quoted through ObjectName.quote(String)
        Returns:
        the corresponding ObjectName
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if an error occurs while attempting to create the object name
        See Also:
        ObjectName.ObjectName(String, Hashtable)

      • buildObjectNameSafe

        public static ObjectName buildObjectNameSafe(String domain,
                                             ObjectName objectName)
                                      throws IllegalArgumentException
        Identical to buildObjectNameSafe(String,Map) but taking properties from an already existing ObjectName
        Parameters:
        domain - the object name's domain
        objectName - the ObjectName to take properties from
        Returns:
        the corresponding ObjectName
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if an error occurs while attempting to create the object name
        See Also:
        ObjectName.ObjectName(String, Hashtable)

      • buildObjectName

        public static ObjectName buildObjectName(String domain,
                                         Map<String,String> properties,
                                         boolean isQuery)
                                  throws MalformedObjectNameException
        Identical to buildObjectName(String,Map,boolean,boolean) but quoting all properties by default.
        Parameters:
        domain - the object name's domain
        properties - a Map containing the object name's properties
        isQuery - Indicates whether the resulting object name should be a query. A ",*" will be added to the end of the object name in that case
        Returns:
        the corresponding ObjectName
        Throws:
        MalformedObjectNameException - if an error occurs when creating the object name
        See Also:
        buildObjectName(String,Map,boolean,boolean)

      • buildObjectName

        public static ObjectName buildObjectName(String domain,
                                         Map<String,String> properties,
                                         boolean isQuery,
                                         boolean quoteProperties)
                                  throws MalformedObjectNameException
        Utility method used to build an object name from a domain and a map of properties.
        Parameters:
        domain - the object name's domain
        properties - a Map containing the object name's properties
        isQuery - Indicates whether the resulting object name should be a query. A ",*" will be added to the end of the object name in that case
        quoteProperties - Indicates whether values should be quoted through ObjectName.quote(String)
        Returns:
        the corresponding ObjectName
        Throws:
        MalformedObjectNameException - if an error occurs when creating the object name
        See Also:
        buildObjectName(String,Map,boolean)

      • valueIsQuoted

        public static boolean valueIsQuoted(String value)
                             throws NullPointerException
        Tests whether the given object name key property value is quoted.
        Parameters:
        value - an object name key property value
        Returns:
        true if value is quoted, false otherwise
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if value is null

      • quote

        public static String quote(String value)
                    throws NullPointerException
        Quotes the given string. This implementation simply adds quotes around the given value, without escaping anything inside it, and is therefore less safe but faster than ObjectName.quote(String).
        Parameters:
        value - the string to quote
        Returns:
        the quoted string
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if value is null

      • unquote

        public static String unquote(String value)
                      throws NullPointerException
        Unquotes the given string. This implementation simply removes the first and last characters of the given value, without unescaping anything inside it, and is therefore less safe but faster than ObjectName.quote(String).
        Parameters:
        value - the string to unquote
        Returns:
        the unquoted string
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if value is null
        IllegalArgumentException - if value has less than 2 characters

      • buildJMXServiceURLSafe

        public static JMXServiceURL buildJMXServiceURLSafe(String jmxServiceURL)
                                            throws NullPointerException,
                                                   IllegalArgumentException
        Utility routine for creating a new JMXServiceURL from a string without having to catch a MalformedURLException. Such exceptions are reported as IllegalArgumentExceptions.
        Parameters:
        jmxServiceURL - the string representation of a JMX service URL
        Returns:
        the corresponding JMXServiceURL
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if jmxServiceURL is null
        IllegalArgumentException - if an error occurs while attempting to create the JMX service URL
        See Also:
        JMXServiceURL.JMXServiceURL(String)

      • getKeyProperties

        public static HashMap<String,String> getKeyProperties(ObjectName objectName)
        Returns the map of key properties in an object name.
        Parameters:
        objectName - an object name
        Returns:
        the HashMap<String,String> containing the same key properties as in objectName.getKeyPropertyList()
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if objectName is null

      • quote

        public static ObjectName quote(ObjectName objectName)
        Quotes all the key property values in the given object name.
        Parameters:
        objectName - an object name
        Returns:
        a new object name with all key property values quoted or objectName if objectName is a pattern
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if objectName is null

      • waitForMBeanToBeRegistered

        public static void waitForMBeanToBeRegistered(MBeanServerConnection mbeanServer,
                                              ObjectName objectName,
                                              long timeout,
                                              TimeUnit unit)
                                       throws InterruptedException,
                                              TimeoutException,
                                              IOException
        Blocks until the MBean with the given object name gets registered in the given MBeanServer, or until a certain timeout is exceeded. Returns immediately if the given MBean is already registered.
        Parameters:
        mbeanServer - the MBeanServer in which the MBean is expected to be registered
        objectName - the ObjectName under which the MBean is expected to be registered
        timeout - the timeout for the MBean to become registered
        unit - the unit of time used to express the timeout
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if mbeanServer, objectName or unit is null
        IllegalArgumentException - if timeout is not strictly positive
        InterruptedException - if the current thread is interrupted while waiting for the MBean to become registered
        TimeoutException - if the MBean with the given object name fails to become registered within the given time
        IOException - IOException can be raised by the MBean server operations

      • waitForMBeanToBeUnregistered

        public static void waitForMBeanToBeUnregistered(MBeanServerConnection mbeanServer,
                                                ObjectName objectName,
                                                long timeout,
                                                TimeUnit unit)
                                         throws InterruptedException,
                                                TimeoutException,
                                                IOException
        Blocks until the MBean with the given object name gets unregistered from the given MBeanServer, or until a certain timeout is exceeded. Returns immediately if the given MBean is not registered.
        Parameters:
        mbeanServer - the MBeanServer from which the MBean is expected to be unregistered
        objectName - the ObjectName under which the MBean is registered
        timeout - the timeout for the MBean to become unregistered
        unit - the unit of time used to express the timeout
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if mbeanServer, objectName or unit is null
        IllegalArgumentException - if timeout is not strictly positive
        InterruptedException - if the current thread is interrupted while waiting for the MBean to become unregistered
        TimeoutException - if the MBean with the given object name fails to become unregistered within the given time
        IOException - IOException can be raised by the MBean server operations
